results.content: He was able to cover the fundamentals of HTML4 in a simplified way making learning easy. The title says learn HTML5, but the contain is HTML4. For HTML5 you have to cover topics like: Web Storage API, Geolocation API, Drag&Drop API, SVG, Canvas an so on. Great Job!

response.content: Hi Sani Kana, thanks for your review. The topics you mentioned here can be covered using JavaScript. But in this course, the purpose is to give the knowledge of topics covered in HTML only and some elements of HTML5.
response.content_html: Hi Sani Kana, thanks for your review. The topics you mentioned here can be covered using JavaScript. But in this course, the purpose is to give the knowledge of topics covered in HTML only and some elements of HTML5.

results.content_html: He was able to cover the fundamentals of HTML4 in a simplified way making learning easy. The title says learn HTML5, but the contain is HTML4. For HTML5 you have to cover topics like: Web Storage API, Geolocation API, Drag&Drop API, SVG, Canvas an so on. Great Job!

results.content: you didn't help in the installation process of vs code and, you used some pre-written code by vs code and didn't explain it.

response.content: Hi Harshit Goyal, thanks for your review. There is no need to teach the installation process because it can be done by everyone. And the pre-written code by VS Code is syntax of HTML generated by using a short key "Shift + 1" already explained in lecture.
